metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14980 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In ImageMagick 7.x before 7.0.8-42 and 6.x before 6.9.10-42, there is a use after free vulnerability in the UnmapBlob function that allows an attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a crafted file.

notes.Note: emitorino> imagemagick <not-affected> (Vulnerable code introduced later) Introduced in https://github.com/ImageMagick/ImageMagick6/commit/6f29b3755748a899145b639195dd3bc640d36bb4 (6.9.10-24)

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
